verses.name: Psalms 11:1
verses.text: In the Lord put I my trust: how say ye to my soul, Flee as a bird to your mountain?

verses.name: Psalms 11:2
verses.text: For, lo, the wicked bend their bow, they make ready their arrow upon the string, that they may privily shoot at the upright in heart.

verses.name: Psalms 11:3
verses.text: If the foundations be destroyed, what can the righteous do?

verses.name: Psalms 11:4
verses.text: The Lord is in his holy temple, the Lord’s throne is in heaven: his eyes behold, his eyelids try, the children of men.

verses.name: Psalms 11:5
verses.text: The Lord trieth the righteous: but the wicked and him that loveth violence his soul hateth.
